attributes.action: The UK should hold a referendum on abolishing the monarchy.
attributes.additional_details: Sign this petition to give power back to the people.
attributes.background: We would like to see the monarchy abolished and the Queen replaced with a democratically elected head of state, we can’t hold the Queen (or her family) accountable, thus there’s nothing stopping them abusing their privilege, misusing their influence and misspending tax payers money.
